text: The 1958 Asian Games, officially known as the III Asian Games, was a sports event in Tokyo, Japan. It occurred from May 24 to June 1, 1958. There were 112 events from 13 sports and disciplines. Category:20th century in Tokyo Category:1958 in Asia Category:1958 in sports Category:Sport in Japan Category:Asian Games by year
title: 1958 Asian Games
